name: Twilight cyclo-crossing
description:
Do you think a lost place at dusk time and CX bike is a good combination? Maybe... 
At this dangerous area you must discover a boxes / items with very essential artefacts. Then come back to starting place on coast and successfully complete the operation. Along the way beware the zombies, they are stupid, but sometimes can hits hardly.

System requirements (optimal):  
CPU - dual-core Intel / AMD
RAM - 2 Gb
GPU - GeForce 750Ti / Radeon RX460
OS - MS Windows 7-8.1-10-11 

P.S.
Now Ukraine holds defence againts the russian evil war machine, so if you can and want to support us please visit these volunteer sites by your choise:
- https://www.comebackalive.in.ua
- https://palianytsia.com
- https://prytulafoundation.org/en
